item.title: converting lists to dataframes
item.description: Intro Lists are tricky. Create a list my.l <- list(a = 1:2, b = 1:3, c = 1:4) my.l ## $a ## [1] 1 2 ## ## $b ## [1] 1 2 3 ## ## $c ## [1] 1 2 3 4 Convert to Dataframe # convert to df df <- data.frame(name = names(my.l), values = unlist(lapply(my.l, "[[", 1))) df ## name values ## a a 1 ## b b 1 ## c c 1 Conclusion Thatâ€™s how you do it.
